articles.title: Fortnite Uncharted: Nathan Drake and Tom Holland skins confirmed - The Verge
articles.description: Epic Games is bringing Uncharted skins to Fortnite on February 17th. The crossover includes Tom Holland appearing in Fortnite for a second time, and the original Nathan Drake character.
articles.content: Uncharted skins are coming to Fortnite on February 17th
